Text.English: Welcome to ReWild! This is a game about resource management and strategy. You'll win once youcomplete all missions, but keep in mind that if 3 villagersget angry at you and leave the island, you'll lose the game! Understood? Let's begin!
Text.Spanish: Bienvenido a ReWild! Esto es un juego sobre estrategia y gestion de recursos. Habras ganado una vez hayas completado todas las misiones, pero ten en mente que si 3 aldeanos se enfadan y abandonan la isla habras perdido!

Text.English: You need to build a house for your first villager to live in!
Text.Spanish: Necesitas construir una casa para que tu primer aldeano pueda vivr en ella!

Text.English:
Well done building that house! 
To build more buildings, you'll have to wait a day to collect the taxes that each villager pays. Each villager pays between 25 and 45 gold.
Text.Spanish:
Buen trabajo construyendo esa casa! 
Para construir mas, deberas esperarte un dia para recoger los impuestos de cada aldeano. Cada aldeano paga entre 25 y 45 de oro.

Text.English: Well done! Now, build an oven to make bread with wheat.
Text.Spanish: Buen trabajo! Ahora, construye un horno para que los aldeanos puedan hornear pan.

Text.English: Build a wheat farm to make wheat!
Let's see if you can survive for some time now...
Text.Spanish: Veamos si puedes sobrevivir durante unos dias ahora...

Text.English: Villagers now need to eat meat, you need to build another industry to make it happen!
Text.Spanish: Los aldeanos necesitan comer carne ahora, necesitaras construir toda una industria para satisfacerlos!

Text.English: Build a pen to keep the pigs in there.
With the industry stablished, try to survive by feeding your villagers meat!
Text.Spanish: Con la industria establecida, intenta sobrevivir alimentando con carne a tus aldeanos!

Text.English: Villagers don't need to eat meat no more!, you can destroy all meat produciong buildings now!
Text.Spanish: Los aldeanos ya no comen mas carne! Puedes destruir todas las construcciones de la industria de la carne!

Text.English: Destroy all meat produciong buildings now!
Text.Spanish: Destruye las construcciones de la industria carnica!

Text.English: Build a tofu farm to make tofu!
Text.Spanish: Construye una plantacion de tofu para tener soja!

Text.English: Build a tofu fermenter to make tofu!
If you survive those last days, you'll win!
Text.Spanish: Si sobrevives estos ultimos dias, habras ganado!
